phases.heading: Exploring Exoplanets
phases.body: Let's learn about Exoplanets. This topic touches our everyday lives in ways we might not notice. From the moment we wake up until we go to sleep, Exoplanets play a role in our world.

phases.heading: What are Exoplanets?
phases.body: Exoplanets in a nutshell. Understanding the basics of Exoplanets helps us appreciate how they work and why they matter. With a little curiosity, we can uncover stories hidden in history, science, and art about Exoplanets.

phases.heading: Digging into Exoplanets
phases.body: More about Exoplanets. Imagine walking through a museum, visiting a lab, or exploring outdoors—each place offers clues about Exoplanets. The more we investigate, the more connections we find to technology, culture, and the natural world.

phases.heading: A wow moment
phases.body: Exoplanets can be surprising! Sometimes a single fact can change how we think about the entire subject, showing just how remarkable Exoplanets truly are.

items.text: An exoplanet is like a hidden treasure, a planet that orbits a star far, far away from our Solar System!
Since 1992, scientists have been uncovering the secrets of exoplanets, with nearly 6,000 confirmed so far!
Imagine 1,001 planetary systems with more than one planet—it's like a cosmic family reunion!
